Text: xiberlokk, If you have the tutorial video that goes with it, please upload also.  Again many thanks. . .

Hello everyone,

I just downloaded this primavera software, but i get an error when i try to install on my windows vista 32 bit it. It says primavera 6.0.msi not found. I checked this same file and it is in the primavera disk that i mounted. I tried to open this file (primavera 6.0.msi) and gives me error again.

Can anyone help me?

Thanks in advance.

It works on Win 7 64-bit so far.  One problem I am having though is that I apparently can't set up a localhost or testing server, and it won't let me work on projects without that.

Anyone know how to use Primavera P6 without an actual server?  Any help would be appreciated!
It may not work for any regular desktop OS. It is meant to work on a Server, like 2003, 2008 for a larger organization. So it may work for any 64bit OS but don't look for it to do everything.

The database name is PMDB only the host name is my problem, i do not know what to put in the host name in order to get this thing work. The instruction included is incomplete. Is there anybody could tell me what is the host name to be used?
